description: [Akira](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1129) examines files prior to encryption to determine if they meet requirements for encryption and can be encrypted by the ransomware. These checks are performed through native Windows functions such as GetFileAttributesW.(Citation: Kersten Akira 2023)

external_references.description: Max Kersten & Alexandre Mundo. (2023, November 29). Akira Ransomware. Retrieved April 4, 2024.
